author: Simon Difford
description: Perhaps serve with a shot glass of champagne on the side so this cocktail literally contains a "glass and a half".  The picture of the glass and a half of milk is still used on Dairy Milk bars, the UK's best-selling chocolate bar, but sadly the slogan was removed after 80 years in 2010 due to contravening European labelling regulations.
name: Dairy Milk Chocolate
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
10 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
